Title: Querelle
Writer: Jean Genet (novel), Rainer Werner Fassbinder (screenplay), Burkhard Driest (screenplay)
Actors: Brad Davis, Franco Nero, Jeanne Moreau, Laurent Malet
Plot: French sailor Querelle arrives in Brest and starts frequenting a strange whorehouse. He discovers that his brother Robert is the lover of the lady owner, Lysiane. Here, you can play dice with Nono, Lysiane's husband : if you win, you are allowed to make love with Lysiane, if you lose, you have to make love with Nono... Querelle loses on purpose...
